text: Big Dreams & High Hopes is the eighth studio album by Jack Ingram. The album was released on August 25, 2009. It was his first new material in 2 years. It was produced by Big Machine Records. It debuted at #21 on Billboard's Top Country Albums Chart.Ken Tucker, 'Talk that Talk', Billboard, Vol. 121, No. 6 (September 12, 2009), p. 31 ==Critical reception== Allmusic reviewer Thom Jurek gave the album three-and-a-half stars out of five. He wrote "Big Dreams & High Hopes is the sound of contemporary country music and all of its tropes." He also said that most of the songs were well-written but not distinctive. ==References== Category:2009 albums
title: Big Dreams & High Hopes
